title: Hextech Chests are not being awarded appropriately for ARAM
body: I confirmed today that S rating do not consistently give hextech chests as they are supposed to.  I am not sure if this bug is specific to ARAM, but this is where my wife and I confirmed the bug.  We both were playing champions we own and have yet to get a chest with.  2 players achieved S in this particular game and neither of us received a chest.  Just wanted to report this and see if anyone else has the same problem.

replies.body: make sure the char u use didn't already earn a chest

The OP says they were using such a champ.
"own and have yet to earn a chest with"

Were either of the people who got an S in your premade?
The chest share thing only works if someone in your premade gets an S.
